name: talkingdata-mobile-user-demographics
data_intro: In this competition, you are going to predict the demographics of a user (gender and age) based on their app download and usage behaviors.  In this competition, Kagglers are challenged to build a model predicting users' demographic characteristics based on their app usage, geolocation, and mobile device properties. Doing so will help millions of developers and brand advertisers around the world pursue data-driven marketing efforts which are relevant to their users and catered to their preferences.
